thread.section_title: WowVendor.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WowVendor.com | wowvendor.com | 3 of 13
thread.title: E. Ray.

author: E. Ray.
title: E. Ray.
text:
I was scepical at first, this is the first time I purchase a wow service, but because of my strict gaming times, it is hard to find friends to do mystic runs with, I contacted wowvendors, purchased the service and within minutes, I get an invite ingame, the group was SO professional and accomodating it was truely a pleasent experiance. group waited for me when I had to afk for a couple minutes to take care of my daughter, group guided me on where to go and what to do, it was amazing, will def. be using thee guys again and would highly recommend using them!
Thanks again guys was a great run!
